headline: Bajaj Finance MD Anup Saha resigns; Rajeev Jain returns to role
summary: BENGALURU (Reuters) -Bajaj Finance managing director Anup Kumar Saha has resigned after nearly four months at the helm, the company said on Monday, adding that Rajeev Jain will return to the role.  The non-banking financial company appointed Jain, who will continue to serve as the company's vice chairman, for a term that ends on March 31, 2028.  Jain served as managing director from 2015 till March this year before he was re-designated as its vice chairman.
